Welcome to the To Do List. Go ahead and add a project with the project button at the top right of the screen. If you already have some projects, click on the one you wish to work on, they are listed at the top left of the screen! And you can always go back a level clicking the x at the top right of this box, or, click on a parent item above to go directly to that task! You can also use the edit button below to edit the task you are currently viewing, the "add task" button to add sub tasks, and the "complete?" button to mark that task complete. Go ahead and give that "complete" button a try and see what happens. Any completed task will have all of its text crossed out to help you keep track of what is or isn't completed!
